task.title: Device Codes
task.shortdesc: Rather than using an email address and password to sign-in on the Square POS app, Square users can create a device code. A device code can only be used on a single device and it creates a unique code for each Device being used.

step.cmd: Then click the three bar icon next to "Home" to open the menu bar.
Click the "Account & Settings" icon to be directed the settings page.
Under the dropdown menu of "Business" click "Devices" to access the Device page.
On your interface, click the button "Add a Device" to go to the Device setup page.
On the Setup Device page input your device nickname and configure the settings on your device.
Then click the button "Create" to access your device code.
You can use the unique device code to sign in to the Square app within the next two days . You can also send the deice code to an email and/or phone number.
